{include "default_salutation"} –

Join the ACLU of Massachusetts on Saturday, August 8 for a virtual rally with the iconic Dr. Angela Davis as we mark this unprecedented moment for civil rights, civil liberties, and racial justice, while raising funds for the ACLU's critical work.

The ACLU will welcome thousands of supporters committed to justice and liberty as we rally for a future we dare to create.

THE FUTURE WE DARE TO CREATE:
RALLY WITH ANGELA DAVIS

Join us to hear a keynote address from iconic civil rights leader, Angela Davis, and a special appearance from the co-founder of Pussy Riot, Nadya Tolokonnikova.

Saturday, August 8, 5 p.m.

Your support and ticket purchase will directly fuel the ACLU's work. Purchase a ticket for yourself or gift to someone else – maybe a friend protesting in the streets, or that family member who is a newly committed social justice ally. Tickets start at $20 with options to add a bundle of activist gear!
